Content.Text:
<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Um, <MYNAME>...? C-could I ask you to wait a
moment?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh! I'm sorry I surprised you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank goodness. I feel so much better now!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's right. I came here because I have a
goddess-ly duty to perform!
<PAGE>
So, <MYNAME>, it looks like everything's
coming up roses with you and your sweetheart,
mmhmmm?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wonderful, wonderful! That's great to hear.
<PAGE>
Now, I'm here today to teach you all about the
time-honored art of <RED>proposing</RED>.
<PAGE>
Umm...I'm still catching up on the intricacies of
it myself, but I'll do my very bestest to teach you
everything I know!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, so, you'll need three things to make your
proposal a smashing success: <RED>a renovated
house</RED>, <RED>a close relationship</RED>, and a <RED>blue feather</RED>.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's start with the <RED>renovated house</RED>.
Hmmmmmm...
<PAGE>
Welp, your current house is big enough. Gotta
have that extra space, 'cause your spouse will be
moving in with you.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's start with the <RED>renovated house</RED>.
Hmmmmmm...
<PAGE>
Marriage means you and your spouse will live
together, so to build a roomier house, get your
mitts on some <BLUE>House Blueprints</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
You can buy House Blueprints from the
Carpenter Shop, and those will let you super-
size your house.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Next, you need to have <RED>a very close relationship</RED>,
of course.
<PAGE>
When you talk with your sweetheart, note the
color of the flower in the corner. If it's red,
you're on the express train to passion-ville!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Lastly, you'll need a <RED>blue feather</RED>.
<PAGE>
In this town, it's a long-standing custom to give
a blue feather to your sweetheart when you
propose.
<PAGE>
When the time is right, you'll find blue feathers
for sale in the <BLUE>General Store</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
When you buy one, it's a good idea to keep it
with you in your bag so you don't miss your
chance to propose.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
If you want your partner to propose to YOU, it's
important to really nurture their feelings for you. 
<PAGE>
You could, um...give them presents! That's it!
Everybody likes presents. Try giving them <RED>lots
and lots</RED> of presents.
<PAGE>
If you've set their heart on fire, they may pop the
question to you one day.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
And, um...I think that's everything.
<PAGE>
Well, my work here is done. Good luck, and
goddess-speed!
